Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent;
local EquipAnim local ShootAnim
function OnChanged(property, mouse) if property == 'Enabled' then if EquipAnim then EquipAnim:Stop() end if Tool.Enabled == false then ShootAnim:Play() mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" else mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" end end end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) local humanoid = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') EquipAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.Equip) ShootAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.Shoot)
-- Make sure that the tool is still equiped when we play equip anim Spawn(function() wait() if Tool:IsDescendantOf(Workspace) then EquipAnim:Play() end end) if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" Tool.Changed:connect(function(property) OnChanged(property, mouse) end) end
function onUnequippedLocal() if EquipAnim then EquipAnim:Stop() end if ShootAnim then ShootAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local debris = game:GetService("Debris") local pellet = script.Parent local startingDamage = 14 local damage = startingDamage local LastHitCharacter
local CreatorTag = pellet:WaitForChild('creator')
function tagHumanoid(humanoid) while humanoid:FindFirstChild('creator') do humanoid.creator:Destroy() end local myTag = CreatorTag:Clone() debris:AddItem(myTag, 4) myTag.Parent = humanoid end
function onTouched(hit) if not (hit and hit.Name ~= 'Handle' and hit.Parent) then return end humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid~=nil and humanoid.Parent ~= LastHitCharacter then if startingDamage == damage and game.Players:playerFromCharacter(hit.Parent) == CreatorTag.Value then return end LastHitCharacter = humanoid.Parent tagHumanoid(humanoid) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) else if hit.CanCollide == false then return end damage = damage / 1.42 if damage < 1 then connection:disconnect() pellet.Parent = nil end end end
connection = pellet.Touched:connect(onTouched)

-- Waits for parent.child to exist, then returns it local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) assert(parent, "ERROR: WaitForChild: parent is nil") while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = WaitForChild(Tool, 'Handle') local VELOCITY = 110 -- constant local VELOCITY_SQAURED = VELOCITY * VELOCITY local VELOCITY_TO_FOURTH = VELOCITY_SQAURED * VELOCITY_SQAURED local ASSET_PREFIX = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
local MyMouse
local SlingShotMeshIds = {Ammo = 94689434, AttachMe = 94689472, Full = 94689497, Handle = 94689515}
local DebrisService = game:GetService('Debris') local ContentProvider = Game:GetService("ContentProvider") local Pellet = Instance.new("Part") Pellet.Locked = true Pellet.BackSurface = 0 Pellet.BottomSurface = 0 Pellet.FrontSurface = 0 Pellet.LeftSurface = 0 Pellet.RightSurface = 0 Pellet.TopSurface = 0 Pellet.Shape = 0 Pellet.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) --Pellet.BrickColor = BrickColor.new('Bright red') --BrickColor.new(2) local PelletMesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') PelletMesh.MeshId = ASSET_PREFIX .. SlingShotMeshIds['Ammo'] PelletMesh.TextureId = ASSET_PREFIX .. 94689543 PelletMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.5, 1.5, 1.5) PelletMesh.Name = 'PelletMesh' PelletMesh.Parent = Pellet
local SlingShotMesh
local EquipSound local SlingshotSounds
local PelletCopy
WaitForChild(Tool, 'PelletScript'):clone().Parent = Pellet
function Fire(mouse_pos)
if SlingshotSounds then local soundNum = math.random(1, #SlingshotSounds) SlingshotSounds[soundNum]:Play() end
-- find player's head pos
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local head = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Head") if head == nil then return end
local startPosition = Tool.Handle.Position + Vector3.new(0,1,0)
local dir = mouse_pos - startPosition dir = dir.unit
local launch = startPosition + 3 * dir
local delta = mouse_pos - launch
local dy = delta.y
local new_delta = Vector3.new(delta.x, 0, delta.z) delta = new_delta
local dx = delta.magnitude local unit_delta = delta.unit
-- acceleration due to gravity in RBX units local g = (-9.81 * 20)
local theta = computeLaunchAngle( dx, dy, g)
local vy = math.sin(theta) local xz = math.cos(theta) local vx = unit_delta.x * xz local vz = unit_delta.z * xz
local missile = Pellet:clone()
missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(launch, launch+Vector3.new(vx,vy,vz))
--missile.Position = launch missile.Velocity = Vector3.new(vx,vy,vz) * VELOCITY
missile.PelletScript.Disabled = false
missile.PelletMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2,2,2)
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" local weaponNameTag = Instance.new('StringValue') weaponNameTag.Name = 'weaponName' weaponNameTag.Value = Tool.Name weaponNameTag.Parent = creator_tag local weaponIconTag = Instance.new('StringValue') weaponIconTag.Name = 'weaponIcon' weaponIconTag.Value = Tool.TextureId weaponIconTag.Parent = creator_tag creator_tag.Parent = missile
DebrisService:AddItem(missile,2.0) missile.Parent = game.Workspace
end
function computeLaunchAngle(dx,dy,grav) -- arcane -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trajectory_of_a_projectile
local g = math.abs(grav) local inRoot = (VELOCITY_TO_FOURTH) - (g * ((g*dx*dx) + (2*dy*VELOCITY_SQAURED))) if inRoot <= 0 then return .25 * math.pi end local root = math.sqrt(inRoot) local inATan1 = ((VELOCITY_SQAURED) + root) / (g*dx)
local inATan2 = ((VELOCITY_SQAURED) - root) / (g*dx) local answer1 = math.atan(inATan1) local answer2 = math.atan(inATan2) return math.min(answer1,answer2) end
Tool.Enabled = true function OnActivated(targetOverride) wait(0) --TODO: Remove when Mouse.Hit and Humanoid.TargetPoint update properly on iPad if not Tool.Enabled then return end local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid == nil or humanoid.Health <= 0 then print("Humanoid not found, or not alive") return end
Tool.Enabled = false local targetPos = targetOverride or MyMouse.Hit.p
Fire(targetPos) if PelletCopy then PelletCopy.Transparency = 1 end -- swap meshes here --[[ for i = 0, 0.2, 0.05 do SlingShotMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5 + i * 8) wait(0.05) end SlingShotMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5) --]] wait(0.2) if PelletCopy then PelletCopy.Transparency = 0 end
Tool.Enabled = true end
function OnEquipped(mouse) --print('equipped') MyMouse = mouse Spawn(function() wait() if Tool:IsDescendantOf(Workspace) then local leftArm = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if leftArm and not PelletCopy then PelletCopy = Pellet:Clone() PelletCopy.CanCollide = false local pelletWeld = Instance.new("Weld") pelletWeld.Part0 = leftArm pelletWeld.Part1 = PelletCopy pelletWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(-.3,1.3,0) PelletCopy.Parent = Tool pelletWeld.Parent = PelletCopy end end end) --MyMouse.TargetFilter = PelletCopy SlingShotMesh = WaitForChild(Handle, 'Mesh') SlingshotSounds = {WaitForChild(Handle, 'SlingshotSound1'), WaitForChild(Handle, 'SlingshotSound2'), WaitForChild(Handle, 'SlingshotSound3')} wait(0.3) EquipSound = WaitForChild(Handle, 'Equip') EquipSound:Play() --[[ for _, id in pairs(SlingShotMeshIds) do ContentProvider:Preload(ASSET_PREFIX .. id) end --]] end
function OnUnequipped() if PelletCopy then PelletCopy:Destroy() PelletCopy = nil end end
Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)
